import React from 'react' const MakeAppointment = (props) => { //Creates minDate for Drop-off let minDate = new Date() let day = minDate.getDate() let month = minDate.getMonth() + 1 let year = minDate.getFullYear() if (day < 10) { day = '0' + day } if (month < 10) { month = '0' + month } minDate = year + '-' + month + '-' + day return (

) } export default MakeAppointment
